sentence: In Senate races, MoveOn is endorsing Mandela Barnes in Wisconsins Democratic primary to take on Sen. Ron Johnson (R-Wis.) as well as incumbent Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.).
title: MoveOn plows $30 million into 'Us vs. MAGA' campaign
